title: Pesadhe Lyrics Thirudan Police Song Lyrics
stanzas:
En Nenjil
Vandhu Ennena Seidhaai Midhakiraen Kaatraaga.
Un Perai Thaanae
En Nenjil Indru Isaikiraen Kaatraaga                                
Pesadhae
Paarvaigal Veesadhae
Vaerenna
Mozhi Vaendum
Mounamae Podhaadhaa??

Kannea
Unnai Alandhadhu Konjam
Kannai
Moodi Rasithadhu Konjam
Innum
Enna Solla Anbae
Theriyaamal
Naan Thavithaenae

Unnaal
Yennai Yezhandhadhu Konjam Unnaal Yennai Adaindhadhum Konjam
Innum
Enna Solla Anbae
Puriyaamal Naan Thudithaenae

Unnaal
Yendhan Penmai Pudhiya Thayakkam Indru Arigindradhey

Nee enna Solla
Naan Yenna Solla
Vaarthaigal Thaevai Dhaana

Nee Yennai Vella
Naan Unnai Vella
Aanalum Indha
Kadhal Porin Yutham adangaadhey

Unnai
Nambi Vittu Vandhaen Nalamdhaana
En Idhayam Angae

Angae
Angae Yennodu Nenjam
Unnidathil Vandhirukkum Thanjam
Kannil
Vaithu Kaaval Seidhaai Yendradhadaa Un Idhayam Ingae

Dhaegam
Irandu Aanal Idhayam
Ondru Ingu Thudikiradhey
Dhooram
Thalli Nindrum Swaasa Kaatru Nammai Inaikiradhey

Nee enna Solla
Naan Yenna Solla
Vaarthaigal Thaevai Dhaana

Nee Yennai Vella
Naan Unnai Vella
Aanalum Indha
Kadhal Porin Yutham adangaadhey
